kpi.name: M5001C0

kpi_info.title: MAXIMUM NUMBER OF AVAILABLE CHANNEL ELEMENTS
kpi_info.use: Maximum number of available Channel Elements. I.e. maximum amount of working baseband resources (HW capacity) in UltraSite WCDMA BTS and maximum amount of basic capacity and licensed capacity together in Flexi WCDMA BTS. UPDATED:When the HW situation changes in the BTS.

kpi.kpi_alias: MAXIMUM NUMBER OF AVAILABLE CHANNEL ELEMENTS
